    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnActionModeFinishedListener, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnActionModeStartedListener, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnCreatePanelMenuListener, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnMenuItemSelectedListener, com.actionbarsherlock.ActionBarSherlock.OnPreparePanelListener

    public class EditEntryActivity
extends com.actionbarsherlock.app.SherlockFragmentActivity
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener
    This class holds the EditEntryActivity. It displays a MapView and the customizable data from the selected LogbookEntry-object which are name, description, frequency and sharing-option.
    Author:
    Dimitri Mantler

    • Method Detail

      • fillForm

        public void fillForm()
        This method fills the form with data from the selected LogbookEntry.

      • generateEntry

        public LogbookEntry generateEntry()
        This method creates a new LogbookEntry-object from the data of the old LogbookEntry-object and the displayed name, description, frequency, sharing-option.
        Returns:
        the new/edited LogbookEntry

      • onClick

        public void onClick(android.view.View v)
        This method will be triggered by clicking a button. save-button: overwrites the old LogbookEntry. maptype-button: switches between normal- and hybridmode. mylocation-button: moves the camera to the marker.
        Specified by:
        onClick in interface android.view.View.OnClickListener

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        This method will be automatically called in the Activity-lifecycle and initializes the GUI.
        Overrides:
        onCreate in class android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity

      • onStart

        public void onStart()
        This method will be automatically called in the Activity-lifecycle and loads the userdata from the local database, if the userdata has been deleted by the system.
        Overrides:
        onStart in class android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
